oHMMed 0.9.0
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    Simulate data

    Functions for simulating data

    hmm_simulate_normal_data()

    Hidden Markov Model simulation with normal data.

    hmm_simulate_poisgamma_data()

    Simulate a Hidden Markov Model based on Poisson-gamma data

    Simulate Hidden Markov Models

    Functions for simulating Hidden Markov Models

    hmm_mcmc_normal()

    MCMC simulation of a Hidden Markov Normal Model

    hmm_mcmc_pois()

    MCMC simulation of a Hidden Markov Normal Model for Poisson model

    Inference

    Functions for inference on Hidden Markov Models

    posterior_probabilities_normal()

    Forward-backward algorithm to calculate the posterior probabilities of hidden states.

    posterior_probabilities_poisgamma()

    Forward-backward algorithm to calculate the posterior probabilities of hidden states in Poisson-Gamma model.

    Diagnostic tools

    plot(<hmm_mcmc_normal>)

    Plot method for hmm_mcmc_normal objects

    plot(<hmm_mcmc_poisson>)

    Plot method for hmm_mcmc_poisson objects

    conf_mat()

    Calculate a confusion matrix...DESCRIPTION TO BE IMPROVED

    kullback_leibler_cont_appr()

    Calculate a continuous approximation of the Kullback-Leibler divergence

    kullback_leibler_disc()

    Calculate a discrete approximation of the Kullback-Leibler divergence

    Helper functions

    generate_random_T()

    Generate a random transition matrix

    eigen_system()

    Calculate eigenvalues and eigenvectors.

    get_pi()

    Get the prior probability of states

    convert_to_ggmcmc()

    Converts MCMC samples into ggmcmc format

    coef(<hmm_mcmc_normal>) coef(<hmm_mcmc_poisson>)

    Extract model estimates
